title: Validate Email subject length > 1000 with O365 and Gmail; and first 1000 characters recorded in alert/events/incidents
custom_steps:
- Enable webui feature flag and enable smtp feature flag
- enable record subject line status to enable in UI and constraint profile selected with "user1@foo.com" to match  
- Generate email traffic from_user as "user1@foo.com" and subject line with > 1000 charachters to have app event/ alerts/ incidents data with Subject line recorded
- verify smtp send ASP connections to DLP and final event object json has subject 
- verify Skope IT app events, alerts and dlp incidents page to evalute subject Line recorded correctly
- verify Title in incidents value should have subject line recorded from email subject
custom_expected:
- verify smtp send ASP connections to DLP and final event object json has subject 
- verify Skope IT app events, alerts and dlp incidents page to evalute subject Line recorded correctly - upto 1000 characters
- verify Title in incidents value should have subject line recorded from email subject - upto 1000 characters
- verify No smtp or DLP service crash
- Validate no garbage value for new line charachter or so..
